channel.title: Update on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Update on ZAP

item.title: ZAP Updates - April 2025
item.description: April 2025 updates and ongoing feature development statuses.

item.title: ZAP Updates - March 2025
item.description: We released 2.16.1 and made more authentication handling improvements.

item.title: ZAP Updates - February 2025
item.description: Authentication, authentication, authentication… And there will be a 2.16.1 release “soon”.

item.title: ZAP Updates - January 2025
item.description: Starting 2025 with a full release, a new way to crawl modern web apps, and better authentication capabilities.

item.title: ZAP Updates - November 2024
item.description: A brand new Scan Policies add-on, how to integrate ZAP with OWASP Noir and ZAP 2.16.0 is getting very close..

item.title: ZAP Updates - October 2024
item.description: ZAP Updates are back after a small break. Read about the updates from October, including an upgrade to Java 17, scanning of sequenced requests, a potential LLM integration, and more.

item.title: ZAP Updates - May 2024
item.description: It was another “full release” month, with 2.15.0 and a brand new add-on for gRPC support.

item.title: ZAP Updates - April 2024
item.description: ZAP professional services, a new Docker Hub org, a new GitHub Action and 2.15.0 is coming soon.

item.title: ZAP Updates - March 2024
item.description: ZAP funding, the Open Source Fellowship, ZAProxy Ltd, script scan rules as first class scan rules.

item.title: ZAP Updates - February 2024
item.description: Restructured desktop menus, OWASP Docker Hub depreciation, Funding, and GSoC.

item.title: ZAP Updates - January 2024
item.description: ZAP funding investigations, a CLA and Google Summer of Code.

item.title: 2023 in Review
item.description: A summary of everything ZAP related that happened in 2023.

item.title: ZAP Development Focus Questionnaire Results
item.description: The questionnaire results, and what we’re doing about the things you care about most.

item.title: ZAP Updates - November 2023
item.description: Improved modern web app handling and lots of videos.

item.title: ZAP Updates - October 2023
item.description: A new ZAP version, a CLI feature to do quick reconnaissance, and more!

item.title: ZAP Updates - September 2023
item.description: Both of our GSoC students completed their projects, and we started a new video series.

item.title: ZAP Updates - August 2023
item.description: August 2023 was a big change for us!

item.title: ZAP Updates - June 2023
item.description: June 2023 updates and ongoing feature development statuses.

item.title: ZAP Docker Images in GitHub Container Registry
item.description: ZAP Docker images are now also published to the GitHub Container Registry.

item.title: ZAP Updates - May 2023
item.description: May 2023 updates and ongoing feature development statuses.

item.title: ZAP Updates - April 2023
item.description: April 2023 updates - the ZAP 2.13.0 Release Candidate is available now!

item.title: ZAP Updates - March 2023
item.description: March 2023 updates and ongoing feature development statuses.

item.title: ZAP Updates 2023 January
item.description: The January 2023 updates including authentication improvements and future plans.

item.title: 2022 in Review
item.description: A summary of everything ZAP related that happened in 2022.

item.title: ZAP Updates 2022 November
item.description: The November 2022 updates, following the 2.12.0 release.

item.title: ZAP Updates 2022 September
item.description: The September 2022 updates, including our new Platinum Supporter - Jit, GSoC 2022 success, more news on the forthcoming 2.12.0 release, and no less than 31 add-on updates!

item.title: ZAP Updates 2022 August
item.description: All of the things that have been happening related to ZAP in August 2022.
